results.deck: Super Fruit Fall is a puzzle game that was released on the Wii, DS, PSP, and PS2
results.name: Super Fruit Fall

results.deck: NBA 06 is a basketball game for the PSP and PS2.
results.name: NBA 06

results.deck: Luxor: Pharaoh's Challenge is a puzlle game that was released on the Wii, PSP, PS2, and DS
results.name: Luxor: Pharaoh's Challenge

results.deck: The 3rd title in the beatmania IIDX series. Features the first of several Dance Express High Speed licenses.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 3rd style

results.deck: The 4th game in the beatmania IIDX series. Features a few more licenses from the Dance Express-Hi Speed CD series, as well as covers of popular 80's tracks from some of Konami's in-house artists.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 4th style

results.deck: The 5th release in the beatmania IIDX series. Marks the first of many appearances from Namco mainstays sampling masters.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 5th style

results.deck: The 6th game in the beatmania IIDX series. This version saw a major graphical upgrade in terms of interface and overall polish. Features many licensed tracks from Avex's Super Eurobeat and Cutting Edge sub labels.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 6th style

results.deck: The 7th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 7th style

results.deck: One Piece: Grand Adventure is a video game for the PlayStation 2 and the GameCube, based on the popular manga and anime series One Piece. Unlike other games in the series, Grand Adventure was developed specifically for the United States.
results.name: One Piece: Grand Adventure

results.deck: The 8th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 8th style

results.deck: The 10th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 9th style

results.deck: The 10th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 10th style

results.deck: The 11th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 11 IIDX RED

results.deck: The 12th game in the IIDX series.
results.name: beatmania IIDX 12 HAPPY SKY

results.deck: The 13th game in the IIDX series - Proceeded by IIDX Happy Sky - Succeeded by IIDX Gold
results.name: beatmania IIDX 13 DistorteD

results.deck: The 14th game in the IIDX series - Proceeded by IIDX DistorteD - Succeeded by IIDX DJ TROOPERS
results.name: beatmania IIDX 14 GOLD

results.deck: The 15th game in the IIDX series - Proceeded by IIDX Gold - Succeeded by IIDX EMPRESS
results.name: beatmania IIDX 15 DJ TROOPERS

results.deck: Ultimate Board Game Collection is a board game compiliation that was released for the Wii, PSP, and PS2.  Common games featured include classics such as Chess, Checkers, and Go.
results.name: Ultimate Board Game Collection

results.deck: The next installment in the Thunder Force series. The game brings the classic scrolling shooter action to the Playstation 2.
results.name: Thunder Force VI

results.deck: Mushihime-sama is a bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave.
results.name: Mushihime-Sama

results.deck: Cocoto Fishing Master is a fishing game starring Neko Entertainment's Cocoto character.
results.name: Cocoto Fishing Master

results.deck: A fitness training game for PC, Xbox, and PS2.
results.name: Yourself Fitness

results.deck: A game where you take control of god and play mind games on a Japanese school boy living alone in his apartment.
results.name: Roommania #203

results.deck: A popular Japanese turn based strategy game featuring mechs from different anime series. This is the final chapter of the Super Robot Wars Alpha series; the Alpha Numbers set out to defeat the Balmar once and for all.
results.name: Super Robot Wars Alpha 3

results.deck: Your Sims aren't in the neighbourhood anymore, welcome... to the great outdoors. Survive, explore and try to find a way off the Tropical Island that has made itself your home.
results.name: The Sims 2 Castaway

results.deck: A direct sequel to the first Avatar game, The Burning Earth takes place during the second book of the Avatar series. The game has gained notoriety for having the easiest achievements on the XBOX 360.
results.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth

results.deck: An arcade semi-truck racing game, 18 Wheeler's success brought console ports and an eventual spiritual successor.
results.name: Eighteen Wheeler: American Pro Trucker

results.deck: Haunted Castle is an action horror platformer for the arcades and a loose remake of the original Castlevania.
results.name: Haunted Castle

results.deck: Can you master 100 levels of Block Breaking marble action?
results.name: Mojo!

results.deck: A Japanese wrestling game that was created by the makers of the Gamecube WWE Day of Reckoning series.  This game features freelance wrestlers and also includes top stars from the biggest promotions in Japan.
results.name: Wrestle Kingdom

results.deck: EyeToy: Kinetic Combat is a fitness training program focused around the ancient art of Kung Gar kung fu. Join fitness trainers Matt, Anna and Leon to learn martial arts skills to increase your fitness from the comfort of your own home.
results.name: EyeToy: Kinetic Combat

results.deck: A singing game, but for rappers.
results.name: Get on Da Mic

results.deck: A supermodel gets turned into an angry giant after being bitten by an alien and it is your job to save the people of Japan from her.
results.name: Demolition Girl

results.deck: The final Super Robot Wars game to be released on the PlayStation 2. It is the start of a brand new "series" of SRW games.
results.name: Super Robot Wars Z

results.deck: Based on the Movie and Book. The story of the young farm boy named Eragon who stumbles upon a dragon egg, leading to adventure.
results.name: Eragon

results.deck: The second game in the Naruto Uzumaki Chronicles sub series. Play as Naruto and other Ninja's as you battle enemies on many different levels.
results.name: Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles 2

results.deck: Devil Summoner 2: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon chronicles the return of tube-toting Raidou the 14th as he cracks another demon-infested case in this latest Devil Summoner title.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner 2 - Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon

results.deck: Flower, Sun and Rain is a PlayStation 2 puzzle adventure game developed by Suda 51. It was also remade on the DS for Europe and the United States.
results.name: Flower, Sun and Rain

results.deck: Another Century's Episode 3: The Final, abbreviated as A.C.E.3, is the final game in the A.C.E series of giant robot action games. It features storylines from many different anime series.
results.name: Another Century's Episode 3: The Final

results.deck: Naval action/rpg set in the time of the american civil war from 1C and Akella. Looks a bit like a Pirates game, with several different 'modes' of play-- ship to ship combat, third person adventuring, 1 on 1 fighting.
results.name: Swashbucklers: Blue vs Grey

results.deck: An arcade scrolling shooter.
results.name: Shadow of Ganymede

results.deck: 2K Sports 2006 edition of the MLB 2K series. It is also the first baseball game of the "next gen" era.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K6

results.deck: Soldier of Fortune is a violent first-person shooter where you take on the role of John Mullins, a mercenary tasked with retrieving stolen nuclear weapons.
results.name: Soldier of Fortune

results.deck: Demon Chaos is a 2005 action-adventure game published by Konami for the PlayStation 2. The game is in vein of the well known Dynasty Warriors series. It is set in feudal Japan in the 1500s and revolves around a priestess who has been given eternal youth until she exterminates all the demons. She has been given charge of a mystical beast from the gods, Inugami, which is controlled by the player.
results.name: Demon Chaos

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Metallica is the second band-specific game in the Guitar Hero franchise. It features 28 songs from the world famous heavy-metal band Metallica, as well as 21 guest acts - picked by Metallica themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Metallica

results.deck: Super Robot Wars MX is a game in the Super Robot Wars series on the Playstation 2, which is a strategy rpg game series known for its crossovers with famous Japanese anime.  This is a spiritual sequel to Super Robot Wars Impact.
results.name: Super Robot Wars MX

results.deck: World Championship Poker: All In (Ft. Howard Lederer) is the third installment in the World Championship Poker series.
results.name: World Championship Poker Featuring Howard Lederer ALL IN

results.deck: Super Robot Wars Impact is the first SRW game for the Playstation 2. It is an enhanced remake of the three chapters of Compact 2 and contains over 100 stages, making it the longest SRW to date.
results.name: Super Robot Wars Impact

results.deck: Homura is an arcade style shoot-em-up that was released for the PS2 in Japan and Europe.
results.name: Homura

results.deck: An enhanced version of AEUG vs. Titans DX, Gundam vs. Zeta Gundam is the second and last "Gundam vs" game to see a Western release.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Zeta Gundam

results.deck: This is the first game in the Super Robot Wars Alpha series to appear on the Playstation 2, featuring the same Simulation RPG action as the previous games and debuting the Squad System.
results.name: Super Robot Wars Alpha 2

results.deck: Play as your favorite Nickelodeon cartoon characters as you take on the evil toy bots.
results.name: Nicktoons: Attack of the Toybots

results.deck: The 7th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music 7

results.deck: College Hoops 2K7 was the 5th installation of 2K Sports' popular College Hoops line of College Basketball Games.
results.name: College Hoops 2K7

results.deck: The 8th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music 8

results.deck: The 9th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music 9

results.deck: The 10th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music 10

results.deck: Part of the World Snooker Championship Franchise developed by Blade Interactive.
results.name: World Snooker Championship 2005

results.deck: Shinobi for the Playstation 2 is the 3-D debut of the classic franchise. In it you play as the ninja Hotsuma, with a cursed sword and an amazing scarf you defend Tokyo from evil.
results.name: Shinobi

results.deck: The 13th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music CARNIVAL

results.deck: The 11th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: Pop'n Music 11

results.deck: The 12th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music IROHA

results.deck: The 14th game in the Pop'n Music franchise.
results.name: pop'n music FEVER!

results.deck: This Best Hits version of Pop'n Music features fan favoirtes of the first 6 Pop'n Music games and also some new songs.
results.name: pop'n music Best Hits

results.deck: A PS2 remake of the first two SRW OG games released on the GBA, includes improved graphics and animation, new battle systems, extra levels and some all new plot.
results.name: Super Robot Wars OG: Original Generations

results.deck: Play as one of 12 countries as you battle your way to the top of the volleyball ranks in Women's Volleyball Championship.
results.name: Women's Volleyball Championship

results.deck: Fight the war during the Mobile Suit Gundam series.  A direct prequel to Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Journey to Jaburo

results.deck: Summer Athletics is a track and field video game released during the hype of the 2008 Beijing Olympics. The game features over two dozen events and a career mode, and supports up to four players.
results.name: Summer Athletics

results.deck: SCORE International Baja 1000 is an offroad racing game featuring over 90 vehicles and multiple classes including trophy trucks, class I, motorcycles, and ATVs.
results.name: SCORE International Baja 1000

results.deck: Lumines Plus is the home console port of Lumines: Puzzle Fusion and Lumines II. This release brings puzzles from both games into one package.
results.name: Lumines Plus

results.deck: Featured in the PS2 release of Half-Life, Decay follows a story running parallel to that of Half-Life, Opposing Force and Blue Shift, featuring two of Gordon Freeman's colleagues unseen in other games. Designed for co-op play, the player must switch back and forth between the two characters if playing alone.
results.name: Half-Life: Decay

results.deck: NBA returns for another season featuring improved graphics, new modes, and online play.
results.name: NBA 09: The Inside

results.deck: Take the role of Shinji and company as they try to prevent (or cause) the Third Impact. This game follows both the original story and variations and alternate events of the World of Neon Genesis Evangelion.
results.name: Shinseiki Evangelion 2: Evangelions

results.deck: MotoGP 08 features high-speed motorcycle racing with famous riders and top bike manufacturers, and promises to be more accessible than ever to beginners.
results.name: MotoGP 08

results.deck: A follow-up to the Action-RPG PS2 launch game Evergrace
results.name: Forever Kingdom

results.deck: A less than mediocre hunting simulator
results.name: Cabela's Alaskan Adventures

results.deck: This PS2 port of the original Fur Fighters updates the graphics and sound, and adds a few new features to the Dreamcast Third-Person Shooter original.
results.name: Fur Fighters: Viggo's Revenge

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon offers perspective from both sides of the One Year War. It is the first game of the arcade-based "Gundam vs" series.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon

results.deck: Yu Yu Hakusho: Dark Tournament was released for the PlayStation 2. The game is based on the Dark Tournament arc of the anime.
results.name: YuYu Hakusho: Dark Tournament

results.deck: 2007's iteration of Sony's first-party exclusive baseball franchise brings the well-regarded gameplay into next-gen with new detailed textures, lifelike player faces, online leagues, weekly roster updates and more on Playstation 3, as well as scaled-back PSP and Playstation 2 versions.
results.name: MLB 07: The Show

results.deck: Armored Core Last Raven is the last game in the PS2 series with a great amount of customization and levels with standardize story. With a large amount parts and millions of designs, leaves players with their own creativity and style of gameplay to approach the game difficult missions
results.name: Armored Core: Last Raven

results.deck: A regular soccer game with some flaws in gameplay and AI. Good entertainment but not very lasting.
results.name: Soccer America International Cup

results.deck: The Japan-exclusive second revision of Guilty Gear X2 adds new balance changes and stage modifications while adding two characters: A.B.A. and Order-Sol.
results.name: Guilty Gear XX Slash

results.deck: Armored Core: Nexus is the eighth game in the Armored Core series, adding new content to the game, including a second disc that brings back the original Armored Core game in graphic remake.
results.name: Armored Core: Nexus

results.deck: The second-to-last PS2 Armored Core game, focusing entirely on arena combat.
results.name: Armored Core: Nine Breaker

results.deck: The tie-in game of the film of the same title. Return to Hogwarts to help Harry survive a fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

results.deck: Select your Eva unit and battle the Angels in this 2D side-scrolling fighting game, stylistically similar to the Super Smash Bros. series.
results.name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Battle Orchestra

results.deck: Cocoto stars in a wacky shooting gallery game.
results.name: Cocoto Magic Circus

results.deck: A game based off the popular manga and anime series.
results.name: Zatch Bell! Mamodo Battles

results.deck: Strange things are happening and Shinji Ikari is tasked to investigate and stop the mysterious murders and odd occurrences throughout Tokyo-3. Using keywords found through conversation as clues, Shinji must uncover the culprits and stop them.
results.name: Meitantei Evangelion

results.deck: A platformer following a weasel and rabbit chained together trying to escape from a product testing corporation.
results.name: Whiplash

results.deck: You are a member of NERV tasked with caring for and raising Rei or Asuka and preparing them to fight the Angels attacking Tokyo-3. Taking the system first seen in Princess Maker, Gainax introduces their Evangelion twist to it.
results.name: Shin Seiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku with Asuka Hokan Keikaku

results.deck: King of Colosseum Red is a Japanese pro wrestling game featuring the All Japan Pro Wrestling, New Japan Pro Wrestling and MMA org, Pancrase Hybrid Wrestling.
results.name: King of Colosseum Red

results.deck: Captain Hook has discovered the island's magical secret and plots to rid Never Land of its enchanting Pixie dust.  This spells danger for Peter Pan in this all-new action adventure.
results.name: Disney's Peter Pan - The Legend Of Never Land

results.deck: Arcana Heart 2 is the sequel to the all-girl fighting game Arcana Heart.
results.name: Arcana Heart 2

results.deck: Allows you to make your own RPG's using a somewhat simplified user interface. The game uses an Earthbound(SNES) style battle system and somewhat interface.
results.name: RPG Maker II

results.deck: The second entry in the .hack//G.U. series. Follow Haseo in his search for answers and a cure for doll syndrome.
results.name: .hack//G.U. Vol. 2: Reminisce

results.deck: .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption is the third and final entry in the .hack//G.U. series.
results.name: .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption

results.deck: The direct sequel to Koei's Naval Ops: Warship Gunner.
results.name: Warship Gunner 2

results.deck: Naval Ops: Commander is the sequel to Naval Ops: Warship Gunner. It puts a more strategic and tactical focus on the franchise.
results.name: Naval Ops: Commander
